mapper.select: select id, order_id, uid, name, phone, car_id, car_sn, car_deposit, car_model_id, status, remark, create_time, update_time, store_id, tenant_id, deposit_order_id from t_car_refund_order where id = #{id}

select id, order_id, uid, name, phone, car_id, car_sn, car_deposit, car_model_id, status, remark, create_time, update_time, store_id, tenant_id, deposit_order_id from t_car_refund_order limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_car_refund_order(order_id, uid, name, phone, car_id, car_sn, car_deposit, car_model_id, status, remark, create_time, update_time, store_id, tenant_id, deposit_order_id) values (#{orderId}, #{uid}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{carId}, #{carSn}, #{carDeposit}, #{carModelId}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{storeId}, #{tenantId}, #{depositOrderId})
mapper.update:
update t_car_refund_order
order_id = #{orderId},
uid = #{uid},
name = #{name},
phone = #{phone},
car_id = #{carId},
car_sn = #{carSn},
car_deposit = #{carDeposit},
car_model_id = #{carModelId},
status = #{status},
remark = #{remark},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
store_id = #{storeId},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
deposit_order_id = #{depositOrderId}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select status from t_car_refund_order where uid = #{uid} and tenant_id = #{tenantId} and car_sn = #{sn} and deposit_order_id = #{depositOrderId} order by create_time desc limit 1
